lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's take it off with some announcements at the top of the show for everyone. First and foremost, we have under an hour until the sale for the temporary special edition #IsItThursdayYet shirts are no longer available. We're pushing in the mid-900s, and see if we can hit a thousand before the hour is up, guys. So if you haven't got one and you're interested, we'll have information in the chat for it. That's our hashtag Is It Thursday Yet shirts soon will be gone forever. So grab one if you want. Also, this marks the anniversary of Team Hoomanism. You guys have been amazing since the beginning of the whole community, through Felicia and starting the whole stream thing. It's been amazing to watch this whole community come together, and part of that celebration for today is go out there and tweet hashtag-- What's the hashtag on this one, Luke?

lines.name: LUKE
lines.text: Hoomanism.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at that. #Hoomanism. That's pretty easy to remember if you're not me. Write a story about a good deed you did this week. Something that you felt really good about, that you brought a little more joy and positivity to the world around you, or saw somebody else do. Just go ahead and tweet with that hashtag, and at some point during tonight's show we're going to be giving away one of our Critical Role shirts that I'm modeling for you, strangely, accidentally for this, but I figure now you know what it looks like on a relatively unfit male.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bear not included.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, let's see. Liam, if you want to go ahead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah I just wanted to, I talked about this last week. I'll probably talk about it next week, but I wanted to encourage you guys if you haven't already to go over to Joe Madureira's Kickstarter for their Battle Chasers game, Battle Chasers: Nightwar. Joe's a friend of mine; he's a comic book legend, and is also a game developer and artist, and I'm just a big fan, and so they're a friend of the show, a lot of us here are in love with Joe-- physically, not his art, just him himself. He's a handsome man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So #BattleChasers, too, that's an awesome thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they, they, hit their goal almost immediately. They're just now making the game that is going to be shinier because they're climbing higher. But just go take a look, his art style is unmatched, and the game is based, is an RPG based in the JRPGs of our youth, and it's going to be great. Go take a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Thank you, Liam. Also, while our esteemed Ashley Johnson has been away for some time, and our cleric has been missing, she's been doing cool stuff in New York, filming for the new show Blindspot. Which just aired earlier this week. So for those of you who want to catch our awesome gnome cleric on the fancy big screen you can go ahead and check out Blindspot, that airs Monday nights on--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: NBC. At I think ten our time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably. I should know this by how much they've been promoting it everywhere. You can't avoid the posters, so I should know. So yeah, check that out. We're hoping that maybe she manages to scoot some Critical Role references or memorabilia onto the screen sometime. Fingers crossed. Also, we're going to have at the intermission today a really cool video that is a presentation of when we visited and delivered the esteemed check donation to 826LA that you guys made possible. We'll have that shown at the break today. It will give you a really clear idea of the charity 826LA, what it looks like, the people that are there, and a lot of the kids that are involved, and what you've helped continue to promote and help grow. So look forward to that at the break. It's going to be good. Does anyone have anything else they want to announce?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have two quick announcements. Hello, everyone. Greetings and salutations. My first announcement is that I will be sitting on Zac's face this whole game. I have found the pillow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sitting on his unicorn stomach.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got the feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is that what you've got?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think it's after.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, probably. He's pretty cute.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And everybody check out my Twitch channel with my name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All righty. We're waiting on our esteemed gnome bard to arrive, due to traffic, and when he does, we have a little present for him, which we will reveal when he arrives. But in the meantime, let's go ahead and kick things off for tonight's episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not ready! [dramatic music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it is a well-oiled machine, Critical Role.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We all trade seats and then come back really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty good. We started doing burpees in between. No, I mean, we just burp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Basically, just burp a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, the gnome is at the door. Can someone let the gnome in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bring in the gnome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you desire a gnome, sire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like the gnome brought before me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bring the king a gnome! Make sure he is of foul mouth and many a song.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, fetching the gnome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I assure you, sire, this gnome has many songs, a very tiny instrument, and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So comfy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does somebody have an extra pencil?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All I have is this broken one from Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In solidarity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I appreciate that you brought it back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing's changed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's a reminder. Yay! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sam, buddy! You made it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh. Okay, I'd like to plug a few things. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because there have been periods of time in which you've complained about not having a proper stein or mug to match the rest of the group, we figure--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got a Google one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Google one works fine. But thanks to some of our wondrous, illustrious campmates we were with at Burning Man, they gifted this unto us to gift unto you, as we felt it was fitting and size-appropriate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes! Yes, it makes me look cute! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to measure that out in a regular cup first, and then pour it in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could pour two whole drinks in there, and it would be half an inch of liquid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, this thing's amazing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So thanks, post-nuclear family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) That is amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a hotel ice thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's technically an ice bucket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to fill it up right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's hiding your face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so to get caught up on what has transpired: the party, after traveling abroad in the distant city of Vasselheim and the surrounding lands, eventually returned to Emon, their central hub city where they had their Greyskull Keep constructed, to relax and take in a brief moment of respite before learning that the Briarwoods, two individuals responsible for much darkness and sadness in the history of Percy, were coming to court in a week to feast and talk with Sovereign Uriel Tal'Dorei. What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lock it up! Jeez.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I poured a whole glass in there and it looks like nothing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone had formal attire on, weapons left at the door, unarmored, dressed for the occasion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true, no armor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys were all dressed in formal attire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't even have any weapons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I need to subtract things from--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The recap makes it so much better. Just lay it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your weapons are at the door. They're not on you at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're at the door? We left them at the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, as part of the check-in process.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question, mine are on me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Because you went invisible and you were under the approval of Seeker Asum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just increased my chances by 2%. Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Percy, your weapons are still on you because you already had an illusion on you, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bad News would be a bit difficult for you to bring in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Diplomacy would work out well, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I think so. During the feast, conversations were had, questions were raised and information was extracted. Seeker Asum had requested to have been met in the foyer by our rogue here, who forgot and then decided to go on his own upstairs following the Briarwoods to the second floor where their guest room was set. He distracted one of the guards with his serpent belt, knocked out the other, entered the room and found himself face to face with the Briarwoods themselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It ended right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So after a brief discussion, a little bit of awkwardness, you attempted to leave, but were placed in a holding pattern by a Hold Person spell, and had the two Briarwoods come up to you, whisper in your ear that you had nothing to worry about, you look delicious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, there's nothing to worry about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're kind of hot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? I mean, they are hot, right? So at least there's that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are we doing while this is happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are just now leaving the feast hall at this period of time.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where are we entering to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A large foyer area. There's the main foyer of the palace that splits off to two smaller meeting chambers and the chamber to the right is what leads to the Grand Hall. That's where you guys were feasting. So you're making your way into this--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hasum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum? Seeker Asum, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seeker Asum. Is he around? Do we see him anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell me this, DM. When my Invisibility spell is broken, am I alerted? Do I know that? Do I sense it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell itself would dissipate, as it is a concentration spell. It would be a, oh, spell's gone. However, before we get to you guys. We have more immediate business to attend to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's play, Matt. Let's play.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The realization of the immediate danger you put yourself in washing over you. You can see across the way, in the dark candlelit area of the room by the canopy bed, is Lady Delilah Briarwood, hand still out, smiling at you. Immediately to your left shoulder is Lord Sylas Briarwood, who has leaned in. He's actually pulling you away from the door now. You're skidding across the ground (dragging sound) as he shifts you, your legs unable to actually move. As he pulls you forward, the Lord whispers in your ear, "You are a curious one, though not quite gifted with the silver "tongue. Foolhardiness is not becoming of a guest of the Briarwoods." For a moment, there's this pause, this tension, the silence, and Delilah, Lady Briarwood, puts her hand out further and says, "Yet, my love, we are not here to make enemies, nor raise suspicion. We are merely "protecting ourselves from intrusion. Isn't that right?" As she looks at you, and looks immediately to your right, where you can feel the general presence of Lord Briarwood. I need you to go ahead and make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First roll. Not an unimportant one.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First roll of the night. Could kill Liam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. That's good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was that? How much?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm frozen!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18, he said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel your muscles lax, and the sweat that is still brimming across your face you feel for the first time in these moments that seem to stretch on forever. You have control of your body, though you do feel the hand of Lord Briarwood right on your shoulder, who, as you become conscious of the fact that you are in control of your physical form, his voice comes very heavily, the bass kicking into your left ear. "Indeed. We do require allies. I would have you prove "friendship." And as he takes and moves the shoulder away, you find your torso moving towards him. You lock eyes with him, and he has this knowing grin, his lids taut slightly with this condescending sense of knowing. I need you to go ahead and make another wisdom saving throw. This is technically a charm effect, and you being a half-elf, you do, I believe, get advantage on those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You feel an extension of the sheer unnatural force of charisma that attempts to penetrate beyond the usual slippery mind that Vax holds to such a high esteem... However, you manage to resist it and feel it wash over you as the slight tingling vanishes and the effect has left you unaffected by whatever he was attempting to try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. What was he trying? Who knows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a brief moment as he looks you over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you need?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. That's so smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There now. Be a good boy." Looks over. I need you to make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Deception check. Okay, I'm using Luck to go again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you used a couple Luck points last time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm about to use my second. (gagging noise) Okay, this is deception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deception, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's not as great. That's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Lady Briarwood just does this with her finger, and the door swings open (creak) on its own. The guard that ran after your belt is standing there holding the groggy, just slightly coming to second guard that you knocked out, and as he pulls him towards the door, he looks over and sees this, and he goes, drops him, and goes for his weapon, and Lord Briarwood puts his hand up, and goes, "Do not worry. We're just having a conversation. Close the door. And get him up." "Yes, not a worry sir." And he closes the door, and you hear the scuffling behind the wood of him, adjusting and waking up the guard who you had clobbered in the side of the head, getting him to consciousness. So they're both just looking you over. Lord Briarwood's just walking back and forth, keeping a very keen eye. He walks between you and the door. As you stand there. Almost like he's waiting for a reaction of some kind, for you to initiate something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It isn't that, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a throaty chuckle from Lady Briarwood across the way. (chuckles) "No, but what "do you think, my love?" Lord Briarwood comes up from behind, his hands on the back of your shoulder, and says, "Like we said, you haven't the gift of the silver tongue. But I applaud your effort."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, my mom and dad said I'm a real good speaker. They paid for a tutor? To teach me how to talk. And it's worked out really well for me in my life. So if you need an ambassador, or a butler who talks? I could do that for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's right behind you. Right between you and the door. She steps forward and looks over at her husband again, and goes, "What do you think? Can we trust him?" And Lord Briarwood leans forward, and you can feel his chin peeking into your peripheral vision. "I'm afraid not. It seems--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, here's the thing you need to know about Uriel. And I take a step back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! Away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's between you and the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, does he hold me if I turn? Well, I just said that, right? Here's the thing about Uriel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go to move away, his arms that are on your shoulder, tighten, flex, and hold you in place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you don't want to know? Okay, I'll just save that for later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for coy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll for what, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since I don't know what you're going to say, I'm going to say persuasion for this. Because I don't know if it's a deception or not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the power out of the DM's hands for a moment?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to use my last Luck of the day!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The last one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Last Luck of the day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, this is persuasion? That's 17.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a big die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could give me a-- never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want an inspiration?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Huh? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) What are you asking for? What are you begging from the DM?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, no, that's why I said never mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it begging or is it praying, at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I'll give inspiration when you've goddamn earned it. As you say that looking at them with this coy look of information about Uriel, they both chuckle in unison. (chuckles) "Shall we?" And she gives a nod and goes, "I think we shall."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I roll for initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're now rolling for initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he have an earring?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Here you are, right there. Lord Briarwood is behind you. Lady Briarwood is over here by the edge of the bed. These are the two windows, this is the layout of the room here. As far as you are aware, there are two guards outside the door, currently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My initiative can only be described as fecal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wasn't a one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wasn't a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One adjacent, is what you're telling me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six, it was six. It comes close.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I thought you were out of there, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. For this, Delilah steps forward, and you can see there's a slight flash of bluish-purple arcane energy in her eyes and her fingers, coalesce around, as she does, she draws her fingers up and you feel this sudden cold pressure around your body. I need to pull out my spells. I don't know what I'm doing here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should I check my iPhone, too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's pulling up his spells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He hasn't had time to memorize all the ways he's going to fuck with you. There are that many ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so I need you to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw, Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. All right. So as she does this you feel all the flesh on your torso and around the neck part of your body all of a sudden begin to dry and crack as if your life force itself is beginning to wither and be drawn out. It's the equivalent of a plant drying out and dying very fast, but it's your flesh instead. You go ahead and take--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds like Blight or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 21 points of necrotic damage, and she's going to go ahead and step this way. After that she backs up and grabs the edge of the post at the side of the bed and looks at you with this grin. At that point as you tense from the pain, Sylas immediately whips to one side and with an unarmed claw attack, a giant fist is going to hit you on the side of your torso. That is going to be a 21 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take eight points of bludgeoning damage as his fist socks you on the inside of your chest area hitting the sternum, and you feel like a slight pain crack sound as it hits and impacts against the leather. As you pull forward, with unnatural speed (whoosh) the hands are back on your shoulder and you hear this little voice say, "Bon Appetit." That is going to be a 25 to hit. All right. Okay, you take six points of piercing damage as suddenly you feel two extremely sharp, warm prongs jut into the side of your neck, and that same cold sensation you felt across your torso all of a sudden begins to pull from the neck, and you feel as if the very warm blood around your throat begins to drain from it. You take an additional 12 points of necrotic damage, and your maximum hit points are currently reduced by 12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh ho! They're sucking the life out of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's holding me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, this will be part of his unarmed attack. No. He does not have you grappled, currently. He's over the shoulders.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. As a bonus action I'm going to use rogue's cunning action to disengage, which means nobody can swipe at me if I run, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Jenga!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a window. Last week, you said there was a window to the courtyard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two windows on each side of the room there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm running straight at the window, and as I run-- yeah, past them, and I don't go anywhere near her, and I'm using dash, and I'm leaping out the window and saying, jenga.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jenga!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (window breaking) As you run past, you can see there's this moment where it's almost like they are letting it happen. There is no momentary aggression or frustration to this as you dart and (crashing) out the window falling from the second story. Go ahead and make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I even stop running?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So at this point you've pushed into the courtyard now. You can see the cobblestone road that surrounds the outskirts of the palace. There are a few bits of light and you can see there is the carriage they came in, horses still attached, and the younger man who led them inside who was driving the coach is napping on the front, who is now looking over, spooked, at the sound of shattering glass as it clatters onto the ground around you. And that ends your turn. Everyone else, you hear jenga whispered through those of you who have the earrings on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's in trouble! Let's go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now we hear shattering glass, don't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from this part of the palace. You're too far away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start running towards the door to grab weapons. And I'm saying into my ear, where are you? What's going on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm by the bartender saying, I ordered a large. Please, can I have a slightly larger one please? What? Oh! Oh shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go eagle, and I start scouting the halls looking for him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running with them towards the doors

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. Am I able to talk further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It took all your effort to even get out of that situation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She and I are booking it for the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're getting a big drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm heading to wherever I saw the Briarwoods taking off whenever they were leaving.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, did you turn into an eagle? Can you carry me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you're big. I can take the gnomes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You burst through the hall and head up the way. As you do, you can see some of the other servants glance around, suddenly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I poop on one of them as I go over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you you're gliding up the staircase and onto the second floor, there are two servants. One darts out of the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's one of the Briarwoods' servants, right? Oh, no. I want to save it for if I fly over one of the Briarwoods. Never mind. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll let it go. So as you coast up, releasing your avian payload on the stairs, you can see, looking jarred and confused, a human woman, brown hair, freckles, mousy-looking servant looks up and reaches up as you spatter the side of her shoulder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (caws) That's me saying sorry.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I see what's going on. You're flying? I cast Fly on myself. I follow suit behind her, and as I'm passing by the person she shat on, I cast Prestidigitation on her. Sorry about that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you head over to meet up with them to grab your weaponry. Although your weapon was probably on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bad News.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go ahead and grab Bad News and pull it off the side. That's your guys' action now, so as you are out front, Lady Briarwood is going to right at the window. Looks down for a second, and I need you to make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? So as you get up and you say jenga. A familiar feel comes over you as your muscles once again lock into place and you fall over from the momentum of the run, going face-down into the cold, dew-covered grass in this courtyard area, unable to move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (muffled) Fucking bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a similar dash fashion and leaping out of the broken window that you left, Lord Briarwood (impact) onto the ground next to you. Three-point landing, stands up over you with this grin. That will be his turn though. At this point in time, one of the bookcases-- you hear this sound real fast, this sound of wood being slammed open, and a surprised noise. That's all you hear from your perspective in the distance. All right, so as you guys get your weapons you begin going where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess running towards the Briarwoods' room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you saw them leave? You head up the stairway, following behind where you saw Keyleth and Tiberius rush off to. Are you following the rest of them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I put my mug down and I start little leg waddling towards them. As I go, I'm going to send a message. I use Message to-- who's the guy who likes us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My name is Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, not him. Sylas? No, not Sylas! Seeker Asum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can cast through solid objects if you're familiar with the target and nobody on the barrier. It's 120 foot, though. You don't know how far he is. You could give it a shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I say, something's gone awry. We may need you right away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hopefully, it found its recipient.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I'm running towards the Briarwoods' room, I start shouting Uriel! and grab a servant and say, go find Uriel. Tell him there's enemies within the gates, in the castle. Now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, Lady Vex. Right away." Runs off. You guys coast up the stairs. Right as you reach the top of the hallway over here, you can see there are two guards that are currently standing at the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stay at the front door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the door open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is currently closed, but you're in eagle form, so you're going to be doing like eagles do. I'll say, you're about there because you were a little bit ahead of them. Those are the two guards right there. At this point now, as this is happening, I need you guys to go ahead and roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's okay. Thanks, Percy. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Keyleth? Keyleth, you got ten, you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so after that current circumstance, that brings us-- as they're rushing up, you would be finishing off the last round, so you can make another wisdom check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I failed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she has to use the rest of her movement getting back up from prone, at that point. She's right there, but you see now, in the window above her, a small humanoid figure. A familiar one that was waiting for you earlier in the foyer, who apparently was hiding inside one of the dressers inside the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seeker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With this, she looks over to you and says, "When we mark a target, he does not escape, I'm afraid." I'm going to see what this does. All right, I need you to make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Start rolling different dice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The universe is random and doesn't care about you and me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Life lessons by Critical Role.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay in school, kids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 34 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm unconscious. I haven't been knocked out in ages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go unconscious, then when it comes back to your next turn, you have to make a death saving throw. If you fail three--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, so it's only if it exceeds my hit point maximum that I'm killed outright, so I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are unconscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, guys. I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that means he never got his "I'm right here" message out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we know he's in the room. That's where we're all heading.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he's not in the room. He's in the front yard, at this point. So we are heading to the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think of Keyleth, beautiful, walking under the trees. I think of my twin sister as a young girl, folding up linens with our mother. I think of my sister as an adolescent in lessons, smarter than me. I think of the woman she grew into. Hiking over many, many, many miles together. My best friend. My best friend, Vex'ahlia. And before I can think no more, I say a prayer to Sarenrae to watch over my friends and keep them safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that thought cast out, the darkness swallows your vision and unconsciousness takes you into the cold, wet grass on the floor of the courtyard surrounding the palace. A small shiver runs down your spine, Vex: a feeling you haven't felt before. A feeling of sudden and immediate sourceless dread, and in that instant you know that there is almost no time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use Hunter's Mark and sense where Lady Briarwood is at that moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she is actually at this point, beyond the palace walls. You can sense and knowing the palace walls. You were expecting a second floor, it's that direction but just outside the walls of the palace. And you guys just got your weapons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off running in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Look at you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hadn't rolled, actually, for that. I hadn't rolled initiative yet. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are coming up into the hallway at this point. Let's see. All right, Vex and Grog, you rush out into the courtyard area, making your way out of the front. Some of the guards can see you dart out and they go to stop you, but they see you going where they're going, they recognize you and let you pass. So that will be for Scanlan, Grog, and Vex'ahlia, your turn is making your way around the outside, using a full run action. You haven't crested the outside of the palace yet. You don't see anything, but you are starting to make your way around the corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my earring during that? I tell Keyleth and Tiberius that I think they are outside the palace walls.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Copy that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I hear that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have your ear pieces on? Then yeah, you would.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I don't run. I Dimension Door outside of the palace wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make an intelligence check. Roll a d20 and add your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good. Oh, wait.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seeing how fast she's running, I go into a rage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait. It says I have advantage on intelligence saving throws. This is not a saving throw. Then no, eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? So you manage to Dimension Door--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Into an outhouse!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As opposed to being directly outside, because you haven't seen this part of the palace, you're not really 100% visual range; you haven't visited this side. You end up trying to come over in this area. You end up appearing right up here inside the room, looking at the window and you can see down. Suddenly you look about this room. To the left of you is Seeker Asum, who doesn't even notice you are there. He is currently putting away a crossbow. Looking out the glass window, you can see down with the little bit of light that's in the courtyard. You see Lord Sylas Briarwood looming over what looks to be the currently unconscious body of Vax'ildan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, it's dark outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it is. Bringing us to this point now, that's your guys' turn. Tiberius? You're up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Does anyone have eyes on Vax? Anyone?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do! Do I?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I do.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where are you, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inside a room. I don't know where I am. It's a nice-looking room.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I assume you're in their chambers. I'll be right there. Fireball to those guys right there! (explosion sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? All right, go ahead and roll damage! Yeah, they did not make their saving throws.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I wanted to say real quick, right before that, I got to my decanter of water and I start charging it, and then I do Fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll your damage on that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How much is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will that also widen up the hole into that room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll see, I guess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or you could make a wall of fire.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How much is that? 35!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35? Okay! One of them gets blasted and thrown almost off his feet and pushed back from the sheer force five foot in that direction. The one that's this side of the doorway, who was already at one hit point, barely brought from already being knocked unconscious by Vax, you hear a scream, and is turned to ash, his charred armor left clattering across the ground.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What about the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both doors are blown open from the force of the explosion. A large portion of the room is currently singed with black. What's your fly speed?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can that dude see me from where I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can currently see you, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Good. I turn to him and I'm like, you better get the hell out of my way! And that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not appear to be interested in threatening what just blew his friend into ashes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cremated him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From behind you, as you're flying over you see this servant come rushing up, the female one that you saw earlier on the stairway. Rushing forward, seemingly with an intense look of what went from curiosity to now engrossed in this current circumstance. Kit, do you want to go ahead and take your place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what's going on? What do we see?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This is where she comes in?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can sit right here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm really sorry I pooped on you! I didn't know I was shitting on you!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cleaned you up. Don't worry!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask a question? Trinket. I didn't say I left him at home. Did he wait outside of the palace during the formal dinner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket would not be at the dinner, per se.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he would have stayed outside at the palace, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket would probably be kept somewhere near the stables, where the people can watch over your animals.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He eats at the table with us all the time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in the middle of the grand hall of the palace of Tal'Dorei, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She taught him to sit in a chair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush in, you see this giant fireball blast through the middle of the hallway. Two of the guards are sent off to the side. There's this hurried look and this shout. You've seen these individuals throughout the palace before, and they're part of the council. You've always kept a distance from them. You're a servant of the palace; you want to keep up appearances for many reasons. However, there's this rush of energy and this general sense of dread in this corner of the palace. And for the most part, judging by this, you didn't like the Briarwoods when they arrived, and you think things are going wrong here. What are you going to do with your turn?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Can I join in the fray?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right over here in the hallway. It's hard to see from this perspective here, but you're right over here.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: DM, who is this person who's just joined us? For the audience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In from the UK to join us for one session of awesomeness.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's the United Kingdom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where the real accents come from!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's going to be doing the worst American accent possible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's going on around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're over here. There's this guard here, and these doorways are blown open and seems to be where all the energy's going. You have a good sense for the flow of energy and emotional tension, and right now everything is pushing in that direction.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Okay, can I use my turn to dash to get through the doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be your turn there. As you glance inside, you can see the gnome member of Vox Machina is there currently at the edge of one window. The left window is shattered on this side. Seeker Asum, another part of the council, is right at that. He looks over his shoulder, looks at you and goes, "Shoo!" You see him look like, what are you doing, no go! Go, stupid servant! That's your turn. All right. That brings us to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were rushing outside with them or rushing up the stairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rushing outside with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're on the outskirts, just cresting around the side of the palace here. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I just there, or am I off the map?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll get to that shortly. You're rushing as fast as you can. You exited the front of the palace and spent your whole turn rushing as fast as you can around the side. It's a long distance, putting all your energy into it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a very long range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no visual, unfortunately. That brings us to Sylas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That dick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. No, sorry. Before Sylas is the Seeker. Seeker Asum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seeker Awesome?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 16?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I make a death saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Unconscious. I'll say there's no dex bonus to that because you can't move out of the way, so that would be 15. I'm sorry, 12. It hits you; I rolled for that. You immediately take a death saving throw. Instantaneously. You failed one. Now, it is Sylas's turn. That was Seeker Asum, now it's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seeker's turn and Sylas got to take a turn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He got a free attack because he moved out of range to try to hit him. Rushes up to join the fray there. He's going to look towards Seeker Asum and say, "This quarrel is not with you." Asum looks over his shoulder. Asum relaxes his grip on Vax's body and stands at attention. And you hear him say, "My apologies, I did not mean to meddle." He seems to be stepping out of the fray.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seeker Asum is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go double my speed. My fly speed is 80 feet right now. I'm going to head towards and pick up Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general dexterity check. You're flying in very tight quarters as a giant eagle flowing through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw, you said? As my eagle form, right? 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Okay, that's fine. You clip a wing. It hurts, and you wince at the impact, but you manage to make your way in there. As you come down, you grab Scanlan, but there's not a lot of room here to get much lift or air, so you're now clutching your gnome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get a save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you not want to be grabbed by her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I don't know she's there. I don't know what's grabbing me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've seen me turn into an eagle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not even looking at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight check? Okay. Not good. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's technically now a grapple contest, so go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An athletics check with my eagle. Is that dex or strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Go ahead and make an acrobatics check to avoid it, or athletics. Athletics or acrobatics, your choice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. As much as you try and fight, the eagle grabs you and your tiny gnome form is grasped in its claws. Oh, woe is this evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First, I got a small drink, and now this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes Keyleth's turn. I need you to make a second death saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I succeeded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you stabilize.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, I'm at one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't die. Sorry. My apologies. Vex, you swing around the corner, just getting to the outskirts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right as I get outside-- I would whistle, but Vex can whistle, and she whistles for Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure where Trinket is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I whistle for him. He knows to listen for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to get as close as possible to the fray?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say as you turn the corner, that will get you about there, and you can see now, there is Seeker Asum and Lord Briarwood both standing over what looks to be a small cluster of cloth, the source of the dread.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I scream. Can I attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, if I did something that did five feet-- ten feet... I've got to look at this. Yeah, ten feet. If I hit Lady Briarwood, would that hit my brother, or would that just hit Bastard Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that would just hit her. Oh, within ten feet? It would hit Seeker and Sylas, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck it, I'm doing it. Lightning Arrow right at her face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. Roll for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't miss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's wedged.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's a weirdo roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You release it with a scream towards Lady Briarwood. Go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I do, times two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, times two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it was 32 damage on her, and then everybody within ten feet has to make a dex save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, he doesn't get one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not him. He's not in it. And I Hunter's Marked her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so it does additional damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Every little bit counts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, Lord Briarwood and Seeker Asum both fail, so they both take the additional damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good. Then 2d8 for them. Nine, and then times two because it was critical? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. I'll allow it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Haggling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Inspired by my brother!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She loves me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Lady Briarwood to follow up on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, of course it is! Okay, eight plus seven is 15 plus two for bracers, so that's 17 times two is 34.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus Hunter's Mark damage, which is another fucking six! 38 damage. No! No, it is 40 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, she's not concentrating because he's unconscious. I was saving for the Hold Person spell, but she's not concentrating on that, currently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's on fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is actually lit on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would that have been part of the part that was multiplied by two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Another six for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does Seeker Asum get a save now that he's been hit, to shake that charm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah, who's now on fire. Laura, the Blazing Bowstring, does that ignite her? Does she take continuous fire damage, or is that just one-time fire damage? No, it's an additional 1d10 once. She shrugs off the flames. I remember that. Angrily.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: At least you messed up her dress.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, fuck that dress!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the electrical energy and the flames dissipate, she puts her hands out like this, and she looks at you for a second and she extends one cruel finger towards you with a look of intense hatred. I need you to make a constitution save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me check. Nope! I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah. Okay, cool. 15. No, wait. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. That's not enough, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh man. That's a lot of rolling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Carry the three...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 66 points of necrotic damage as a sickly beam of black energy streaks out from her finger, plows into your torso, and you feel as if your soul is temporarily pulled from a portion of your body. For a second there, your eyes glance past the threshold of death, and you manage to pull yourself back in. The cold resonates through the rest of your body, and all of a sudden the temperature outside, which was already pretty chilly, feels freezing cold. Brush with the Finger of Death. All right, she is going to move over towards Sylas right here, getting into a protective standpoint, glancing down at the unconscious body of Vax. That brings us to-- we have Grog, Tiberius, and Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going first. Fucking shit. I know she's got me in her fucking claws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've figured this out now, after this whole (yelps). Keyleth, of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I still see through the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see through the window right there, yeah. It's hard, at this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll use my bonus action first to cast Healing Word on Vax. (singing) Oh, that Vax elf--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Healing Word?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is not close enough to reach. You'll have to move first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then maybe you don't want to go first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can take you over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would I know that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would know the range of it. You'd be like, "Ugh, he's too far."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can move first, can't you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't move. She's holding me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can wait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to give you a fast way down, motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. I guess I'll hold my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. Move me an additional 30 feet because my flight is 60 feet, so that was from the last turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 60 feet flying speed. Good to know.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How far can I go? Can I go all the way down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get, right there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Crap, balls. Can I see anything? I can't see anything. Outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the 60 feet for your movement.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm still flying, so can I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, from an elevated standpoint, you would probably just barely be able to see the edge of Lord Briarwood down there, below. He would have three-quarters cover, but you can see him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can't see Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Not from the angle of the window.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I charge my decanter. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. You can use your action to move, if you want to get closer to the window.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh shit. Yeah. Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or you could go outside, if you wanted to.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Then I can't do anything else after that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be the end of your turn, regardless.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, then get me right where I can see Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, skootch me one over. I can still see him from right there, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can see him there. Cool, so you're floating in the air, currently, looking through the cracked window at the cluster of mayhem that's below. That ends Tiberius's turn. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Raging, I see Vex take off so fast. I try and catch up to her and see what's freaking her out so much. My speed is 50.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said 30!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're after me. It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all happening simultaneously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the Firebrand Warhammer with the Chain of Returning attached to it. I activate it, and I throw it at Lady Delilah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the range on it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It doesn't have a distance. It has a DC to pull it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here's what we'll do. It's the warhammer or war pick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the warhammer, but the Chain of Returning doesn't have a distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. It's the distance of the weapon, is what it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking it up right now for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did we do before iPhones?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How is it 150/120?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because you used it when we were fighting that manta ray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't have a Player's Handbook. If somebody could look up the equipment section right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you looking for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Excuse the sound change here, as I have to move the mic. There we go. I got it. There is a range on thrown weapons, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it count as a mace? Handaxe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Warhammer... this one is not considered an actual normally thrown weapon, so I would give it the same distance of a handaxe, which is 60-foot max, but you would be at disadvantage on the throw, anyway. Pretty heavy disadvantage on this, so we'll give it a shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That doesn't even make 60 feet, though, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. As you lob--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I know how long it is, can I do something else instead of throwing it? If I'd known the distance--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you know the distance, then I'll say sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try for Intimidating Presence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a DC saving throw--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She glances over at you as you come running around the corner, this giant engine of muscle and death. You growl at her, screaming--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (roars) No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. She glances over at you and you see her head turn to the side with a curious chuckle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So low! God!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bring it back to Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing your turn. Continue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will 60 feet hit him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it would.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything's going to be all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like I'm going insane!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so roll for how much you heal him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even though that's a bonus action, I'm going to do it as a 5th-level spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an additional 1d4 for each, so it would be 5d4 plus five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I roll it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, then give me a bunch of d4s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kit, you're on deck, so imagine what you're going to do next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need one more. Great. Okay. Whoa, what the hell is that one? Ah, shit! What are these? I can never add d4.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 12. Plus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five. So you heal 17 hit points. From the darkness--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is it plus five, or is it plus five, five, five--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's plus five. Consciousness comes to you. Breath comes into your chest, and you can feel the cold, wet grass against the left side of your face. Your vision begins to clarify for a second, and you look up over you. You can see immediately to the right of you both Lord and Lady Briarwood standing over you, looking down with one half of their gaze, the other paying attention to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're looking at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're looking down at you and glancing at this slowly encroaching circle of assailants. That was your bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was my bonus action. As my

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the DC on that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that. Okay, good to know. What are you suggesting to her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm suggesting that she has an unquenchable urge to make out with her husband.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And what saving throw is it? Is it a wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has advantage on it, anyway. All right. Yeah, she rolled a natural 18, plus her wisdom bonus of two. That puts her at a 20. She just crested over it. You can see, she glances up for a second at you. The presence of the actual shouting and the Suggestion echoing through the glass and out the other broken window. She looks up and you see parts of the shards of the glass are actually shaking from your singing. The harmonic resonance of the glass catching your--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She doesn't feel even a little bit horny?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather that probably at all given points of time, she probably enjoys being close to her husband, but not overcome with an uncontrollable urge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She has a headache.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kit.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Okay. Am I within 120 feet of either of the Briarwoods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, but they're not currently in visual range because they're outside and down below, so if you want to try and move over this way, you can try to get a visual.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Am I able to move somewhere where I can see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have to leap up onto the edge of the canopy bed. You can just see them past the broken window, down into the courtyard there, as Tiberius, the dragonborn you saw coast through, is hovering in the air about five feet above you.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I would like to -- oh, there's lots of excitement going on, isn't there? I would like to use Crown of Madness, if I may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! I thought she was just a common guard!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Servant.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I would like to use Crown of Madness on Lord Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. What is the DC on the spell?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: My DC would be eight plus my spellcasting modifier--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should be at the very top of your spell sheet.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Okay. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Even with his plus seven--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, is something actually going to work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is going to use his legendary resistance to succeed the saving throw. So as you do that, you see the magical energy form around his head and this crown of darkened arcane energy forms and begins to clasp around, and he looks up for a second and shrugs his hair like that, and it (crash) dissipates, and you can see for a brief second his vision come up and find your gaze.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But Matt, she's our guest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I understand! As it was a concentration spell, also, the illusion that you currently were holding fades away. What was once the demure, mousy-looking human guest suddenly appears as a pale, white tiefling, currently now existing at the edge of the bed. Her image shimmers and disappears as you see her standing before you on her hoofed legs, holding what was previously a non-visible staff in one hand.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm right above her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are right above her, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I go, ooh! Nice horns!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking over your shoulder, you're a little bit in front of her, but yeah, you see her. All right, so that will be your turn there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our friend is in mortal danger right now, you maybe wouldn't want to hit on somebody, at that moment.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I would have to agree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy. Following suit, you begin to move around the corner to the others. You are now within visual range of both Briarwoods-- at a far distance, though-- too far for the Pepperbox. No, its range is 150, so yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pepperbox range is 150, but the Bad News range is disgusting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah, they're within range for both.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'll start with Bad News.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing travels faster.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) All right. First shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against who?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (yelling) Sylas!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. I got little goosebumps from that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 30 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rock. His. Shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) This is about to feel so good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: De-cleat this motherfucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are the worst people we've ever faced.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's my other d12s?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: d12s? 12, 12 away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 17 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The first shot. As you (gunshot), the shot echoing out across the night sky of Emon, Lord Briarwood, who is currently staring down at you as you come to consciousness, and you can see under his breath, he says, "Oh, there's no way out tonight, friend." And begins to lean forward before (impact) the back of his shoulder is wracked by a sudden impact. You see dark material just (spray) spatter out with some sort of dark crimson, and he (grunts). Looks over his shoulder with anger, and you can see at that point, glistening across the moonlight, the sharpened fangs visible at the edge of his mouth. As he looks over--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he looking at me? Okay, good, I'm taking another aimed shot at his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use your second attack to reload.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Third shot, aimed shot at the face, while he was turning around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As he reloaded, weakly, behind him, I go, hi, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 to hit will hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Skadoosh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) That's 28 points of damage, and he has disadvantage on all attacks for this round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A big chunk of flesh is just blown off and you can see the bone beneath. (grunts, growls)

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: No mercy Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that as far as I can make it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was already loaded with a bolt into it, and he's going to take a shot at Grog, who's currently the biggest target right now. That's going to be-- rolled a two. That's going to be a 13 against armor class.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will be a 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending that turn, now it comes to Lord Briarwood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, I didn't get my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up after him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I have a question. At some point I'm in the mix?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're coming up. Don't worry. You guys rolled the lowest initiatives.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, he's prone, still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still prone, yeah. So Sylas is going to, seeing the circumstance, reach down and attempt to grab you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get out of there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, that's going to be a total of 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To do what? To grapple check? Do I have to roll, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To attempt to grapple you, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I roll, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, fuck that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, that comes to 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For hitting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For hitting you. All right. And now he's going to make an athletics check to attempt to grapple you. That is going to be a 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As I see this going on, can I call out with Cutting Words to distract him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. (singing) Distraction, distraction! Distraction! Distraction, distraction!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d10. And subtract that from his attack modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. With that, as he reaches down in an attempt to grapple you and grab you by the throat, the fingers are coming towards you and you try and attempt to roll out of the way. All of sudden, you hear, "Distraction!" and Lord Briarwood's, (annoyed sigh). You see his massive eyeroll and then goes in for the attack, but that's given you enough time to roll out of the way his hand only meets the ground. He's then going to step back and get adjacent to Lady Briarwood. That ends his turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to fly out the window with Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out the broken one over here or the non-broken one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The broken one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you doing to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're coasting over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and drop him off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you swoop down and leave Scanlan right there in front of them, that'll be there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So Seeker Asum, he's against us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea, you just swooped out there and he's there like hiding in the shadow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he just fired at Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't see it, though, from your perspective there. You just saw a bolt go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I didn't see that. Do I still have enough movement to make an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah you do, yes, that was just your movement as you swooped down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Lord Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go and try and peck his eyes out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you dropping me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I dropped you off, I'm going to go and swoop over--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You've already used your movement to get there and drop him off and go all the way around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you used your full movement to get there and drop off Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you still want to be an eagle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, because it's a hit point sponge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you know what, I'll drop eagle form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, all of a sudden the eagle condenses down and forms back into Keyleth in her half-elven form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I will also use my bonus action to cast Healing Word on Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I will also cast it at-- actually, I'll cast it at a 3rd level because I want to be safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here are some d4s.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She cast it at Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you need one more, right? At level three?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and it's plus my spell modifier? Is that what it is? Plus ten, so yeah, I need one more, so that's 17 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of healing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hers is different.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, wait. No, 15. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're back, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to tell me what's possible. I'm prone, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are prone on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is what I'd like to do. You tell me if it's possible. I'd like to click my boots of haste together and then get up, which takes my full movement? What does it take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half your movement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half my movement. This is what I want to do, you tell me if it's possible. Click my boots of haste, get up, use disengage again, and then run like a motherfuck straight towards--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could probably do that, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I want to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Straight towards what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My sister. And as I run past, I share a very awkward glance with Keyleth and keep going and just run and lock eyes with my sister and run at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. (laughs) How did that happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dimension Door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn. At the top is Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill some people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah, I'm going to take a healing potion. A superior, which is what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Superior would be 8d4 plus eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so many fours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not like you don't have 30 dice anyway. So many dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These fuckers, I'm so angry at them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20. Oh, 28. That's good. And then I'm going to cast-- I'm sorry, Hunter's Mark. I'm going to cast Hail of Thorns right at the one in the middle. They're right next to each other, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You would be scooting right over Scanlan's head with your arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Balls. Oh wait, do I, I don't need to roll to hit on that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would say on the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 would not hit, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I try it again. I didn't hit her again! It's because you're safe now, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as she stands there grinning, looking over all this, they're both amused by this whole circumstance, there isn't really a glimmer of fear. As the first arrow comes by, she leans to the side, just dodges it a little bit. The second one comes towards her, and Lord Briarwood deflects it out from in front of her and gives you a look of like, don't you dare touch my woman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, did he hear? I whistle again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. With that, you see the dragonborn comes flying up through the window, and Delilah looks back at everyone and sees everyone rushing forward and says, "Honey, we'll deal with "them. Worse comes to worst." And she glances up at you. "But you."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm Tiberius Stormwind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, indeed you are." As she looks at you for a second, and there's this sparkle, this prismatic glow of light in her eyes. I need you--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 4th-level Counterspell. Were you saying something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold on. (laughs) I think distance makes a difference with these people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're going to attempt to counter. Let's do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dice versus dice. Wizard versus wizard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d20, add five.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's not going to do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But that's a lucky number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that point, all of a sudden, you feel a surge of arcane energy suddenly burst, not visually, but on this coursing connection, almost like two nexus points of energy. There's this tidal wave of arcane energy that blasts into your mind. I need you to go ahead and make an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they Superman and Wonder Woman? What the heck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you take 21 points of psychic damage--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (yelps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And your intelligence and charisma scores become one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly, language leaves you. All the spells, the nature of spellcasting, is robbed, and you know where you are, but everything is instinctual. From this point, you are essentially, from a communication standpoint, a giant lizard.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (lizard noises) Am I still flying? I'm assuming I fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, actually, yeah, you do, because you can only maintain concentration. And you land on the ground. She then steps--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait! Is it permanent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can fix it. It's okay; don't worry about it right now. I can't fix it

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius. It's your turn.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What the fuck can I do? Is there a saving throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is no save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of every 30 days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just not right now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is what she would be saying if she was knowing this was happening to you. So anyway. You still know your friends. You know you have friends here. You know there's something to protect. You know that people need protection. You must protect! And that's the extent of where your drive is right now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I guess-- and I'm confused as hell, I assume?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frustration. Protect." It's all base instincts right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he know friend from foe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm going to whip around to that guy and go, (aggressive lizard noises).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he goes, (scared noises).

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because I know I don't like him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. And takes another five foot step back from you. Unexpected feral reaction from Tiberius!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm going to dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I moved you double. Okay, that ends your turn? Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me? I would like to run towards the fucking Lord Sylas. Can I reach him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't get all the way there, but you can get within throwing range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Throwing range only? Yeah, I'm going to throw the hammer again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so now you (whoosh) lob it, the flames arcing in a circle towards him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.
