lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, all right. So (smash) the hammer hits him in the front, the flames burst from the impact, you can hear the metal clang of metal against the armor he's wearing under his outfit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You did 18 damage, then, good to know. All right, so go ahead, and if you want to try and retract, it's a bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I succeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull in the chain. It whips back. Like Thor, you catch it mid-air, prepare yourself for the next round. That'll be your turn. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now there, face to face. You are essentially the shield of the group between the Briarwoods.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Hello. What a lovely dinner we had-- Lightning! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You immediately feel this counteractive arcane energy. If she hadn't rolled a natural one on her Counterspell, that would've been pretty bad. But through the sheer force of frustration and anger at this point now, the lightning bolt presses through her counter, and the bolt is released in that direction, arcing towards both of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, she rolled a one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She rolled a one to try and counter your spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Please make it funny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so wait, I get to roll for damage now? It's a bunch of d6s right? 8d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 8d6. And for their saving throws--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I arc it so it hits both of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it would hit them both.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would it also hit Mr. Awesome?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's off to the left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So they do both make their saving throw, so they both take half damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course they do. Hate them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32, okay. That's a 16 to Sylas and eight to Lady Delilah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, she can take half of half?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Magic resistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of them (impact sounds) take the blast from the-- and you see this look of: okay, things are getting a little weird now. They both look at each other with a realizing they're now a front of two against many swarming individuals. Do you want to move or stay where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will move backwards. By a lot. And have I seen the tiefling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not. Oh no, you did. You flew past as you went and you were like: what the heck is that? And then you pulled out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I don't have eyes on her? So I can't inspire her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Can you feel the blood tonight? That's it, that's all I got. (laughs) All right. So you're inspired.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks. I get a d10 right? Ha! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that ends your turn. That brings us to you.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: My tail is whipping, and I would like to use Phantasmal Killer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is that?!

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: To Lord Briarwood. Again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her accent is so fake.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: (exaggerated American accent) I know, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So are you staying at the edge of the bed, or are you going towards the window to have a clear view?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I'll move forward a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you leap off the side of the bed, come up to the edge of the broken window, looking down towards it. All right! Let's try and make this wisdom saving throw. Chose to make his save, using his legendary resistance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, how many times does he get that damn thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's like a dragon!

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: It's fine, I'll wear him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, the target still becomes frightened for the duration. So now, as you do this and look up, Lord Briarwood has had this cocky grin the whole time, sees this sudden albino tiefling in the window glare down and send this shimmering wave of arcane energy hissing from above. The echo of the hiss hits Lord Briarwood and for the first time, you see him recoil in strange momentary terror and seems to almost step back into the side of his wife. Glances over his shoulder towards her and she gives him a look of misunderstanding and acknowledgement. So he cannot get near you, currently. Cannot get any closer to you and has disadvantage against anything against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just her or us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Clap hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Very cool. So that's your turn on that one. Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a standard walking speed 30 feet straight ahead. Swinging Bad News back onto my back, pulling out Pepperbox. Sylas! I'm getting his attention again. I'm going to start shooting with--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you still in disguise?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't think anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the moment you fired, the illusion dissipated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. So I'm going to be using my sharpshooter for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 26 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's, let's see. Oh, I need one of these, too. That's 22 points of damage and one point of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Same thing again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you've shot, reload, shot. And this turn--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I put Bad News away. Bad News is empty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, so Bad News is empty. That's the first shot. You got this. Cool. Sorry, I misunderstood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ain't going to be a dick about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so this is the first shot. Second shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 21 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shooting again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Terrible. Absolutely useless. All right, so Sylas now is going to angrily look around and pulls off from the back, you can see this shimmer as there was an illusion dissipates and what previously looked like it was an empty back, a large scabbard appears. Pulling this giant dark, slate-gray greatsword from the back and lunges forward towards you, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sylas?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did someone ever get Uriel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 26 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take 12 points of slashing damage. Reduced to six. And I need you to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have advantage on those if I'm raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you just have a high constitution.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He still has disadvantage on attacks, right? That wore off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, all right. You feel like the actual wound from the blade is attempting to draw some force from your body, but you just (grunts) and flex and whatever arcane enchantment is resisted. Turns around for a second swipe, that is going to be a 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Round up for use. So eight. And make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it. Ha! Even better. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, once again. There's some sort of enchantment that's trying to pull from the wounds as it hits you and you just grin them off with this chuckle. So he's going to use the rest of his movement to step back a little bit. You get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do. With the hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! That's 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome. That's 11, plus four points of fire damage, so 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends his turn. Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My turn? Okay. Wait, where did Briarwood go? Lord Briarwood.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he backed up. Beautiful. So I take my staff and I crack it on the ground. Where I cracked it, little ice crystals start forming against the ground and start making ice and I'm going to cast Sleet Storm. I need a thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a 20. What do you want?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No I need a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you need?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A laser pointer! There you go. So it's a 40-foot radius. Starting where Briarwood is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. A 40-foot radius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. Starting in this line. Grog's not in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way, you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From here back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Sleet Storm (boom) right in that area right there. So as you slam the ground, the ice begins to move around and all of a sudden the cold air begins to form this almost like mist as the temperature shift suddenly impacts the surrounding vicinity. The grass freezes in place, and you can see bits of ice and sleet begin to rain down in the vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the ground in the area is difficult terrain. It is covered with slick ice. When a creature enters the spell's area for a first time or on its turn starts its turn there, it must make a dexterity saving throw or else it's knocked prone, because they slip and fall. If a creature is concentrating in the spell's area the creature must make a successful concentration saving throw against your spell's DC or lose concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you have inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. All righty. So?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I move back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to throw one dagger at Briarwood's face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a one. If I'm hasted, can I do two potions? Instead of attack, attack, attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The additional action is not so much a potion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And greater healing is 4d4, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Greater healing is 4d4 plus four, yeah. All right, that ends your turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Knowing that they seem to be vampires because they've fucking creepy teeth, I'm going to pull out one of my holy arrows and shoot it at-- Lord Briarwood's in the way of Lady Briarwood now, isn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try and shoot either if you want to move over to the side and get a better view.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well I'm going to cast Hunter's Mark on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On him? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to shoot my holy arrow through my Blazing Bowstring one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on! Hold on! 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good. Do I do any additional damage with my holy arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage for the arrow. And you do an additional 2d6 radiant damage to Lord Briarwood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait. 15, 19. Plus ten for the Blazing Bowstring, so 22, and then what did you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven more, so 29 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. So as the arrow impacts, (impact sound) he puts up his cloak to guard in time, as it goes (whooshing) through the cloak, you hear this (grunts) in pain as the arrow bursts, and as the cloak comes back, you can see this burning sensation across the front of Lord Briarwood. Where the flesh was healing and sewing itself up, that has been halted immediately by the impact of the holy water, which is beginning to pockmark and burn his flesh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. Then I'm going to hit him again! (laughs) So yes, I'm going to do the same thing! Except I'm out of my Blazing Bowstring; it fizzled out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay that's a 29 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. That's good. Plus two radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your second holy arrow, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was it before that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17. 28. And then another d6 for my Hunter's Mark. 32!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Second one (impact) shatters and you can see now, like part of the jaw is hurt and wounded. (panting) There's this wild frenzy to his face as you can see Lord Briarwood is starting to look a little ragged. All right. That ends your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lady Delilah Briarwood steps forward up to the back of her husband.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's got to make a dex throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It just says they just have to make a dexterity saving throw or they're knocked prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but it's against your DC of your spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is it? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, she makes it. So she steps forward; almost slips, but catches herself on the shoulder of her husband and says, "My dear, I fear it's time that we make our leave."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make our leave?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, they're going to bamf!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Casts Dimension Door. Both of them (whoosh) out of visible range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! I turn to Vex. Vex, does your Hunter's Mark tell you where they went? They just disappeared. Where'd they go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They fucking disappeared?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: They Dimension Doored out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do have Hunter's Mark on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On him, yes. You sense that they're not that far from you. They're around the corner where you guys came from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're right there! Do we want to keep fighting them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's ragged! Go! If we're ever going to get them, we need to get them now! Lead the way, Percival!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're around the corner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can probably teleport us through a tree, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's okay, we'll just run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys rush around the corner you can see on the very edge of the cobblestone walkway, the carriage that they came in is now gaining speed--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sharpshoot right now. I'm going to try and take out a wheel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling) Close the gates!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points of damage, all right. The wheel splinters and (grinding sound) is now coasting on the ground. The young gentleman who is currently on the top is looking over his shoulder, trying desperately to usher them away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How, roughly, far away are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, they're about a hundred feet--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Trinket anywhere near them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket was over at the stables on the far back of the palace, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to move it over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you just shift it over there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It's a concentration spell. It lasts a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh well no, it's concentration to keep it in the area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, then I cast it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're casting Sleet Storm again. What's the range on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 150 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 150 feet. The sleet storm lands down. The cobblestone becomes sleek; the carriage begins rocking back and forth. However, it does manage to keep on its course, currently; it does not get knocked prone. It's hard to knock a carriage prone, but it is sliding out of the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a disadvantage because it only has three wheels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good call, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it's rough terrain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the carriage (crash) slams onto the side of the ground and skids (creaking) to a halt in the middle of the ice, the sleet still spackling down as you guys all turn the corner now; as you approach. The gates have closed (slamming) as the guards have slammed it, listening to Grog on the far side. The door pops open on the side of the carriage. Tiberius, as you've made your way back around and you're at the front now, (panting) and you can see now, about 60 feet in front of you the carriage is overturned in the middle of this sleet storm, on the ground.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From a visual standpoint, you're about 60 to 70 feet from the front of this. The doors slam open and you can see Lord and Lady Briarwood step out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I shoot my exploding arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're always welcome back home. It'd be nice of "you to visit your family once in a while." Roll initiative. Just you. As you were the first action to take.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? Go ahead and roll. Roll the attack for the exploding arrow. This is against Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 29. It's against her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 29'll hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I do damage for the exploding arrow? That Percy made, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Roll for your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 16 regular arrow damage? Okay, against Lady Briarwood. Cool. All right, and then for the additional blast that blows up it's additional 4d6 blast damage to her and they both get saving throws to try and halve it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay I'm rolling one of our Critical Role dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So half damage to both of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trademark!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Critical fail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? So half that, six damage to each. She needs to make a concentration check. Advantage on that for war caster. Yeah, that's a 19. Okay. So (explosion), a portion of the outside of the carriage just blows apart. Wood shrapnel goes flying to each other side. As the smoke settles and the explosion, you can see, both Lord and Lady Briarwood are still standing there, seemingly unscathed by the event. She wraps her arms around him and whispers in his ear, "It's all right." And they both (whoosh) vanish in a swirl of arcane energy. You don't recognize it because right now you don't have the intelligence to really--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to walk over to the carriage driver.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want from me?" (labored breathing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About what?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I shoot him in the right hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gunshot, screams) It's an easy enough hit, he's prone before you. Three of his fingers are blown off, and the bloody stumps. (gasps, grunts) Shaking. (panting) "I'm sorry. I don't-- look-- "

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're from Whitestone, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am. You don't know what it's like. I had no choice."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you do now. I reload again and put it on his left hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please don't, please." The rest of you are gathered, and you step out from the edge of the window and make your way with the rest of the crowd, and they're watching this display on the front of the palace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Frederick de Rolo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's gone. He's gone, sir. I'm sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lady Johanna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're all gone. Sir, they all--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Julius de Rolo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vesper de Rolo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitney de Rolo. Ludwig de Rolo. Oliver de Rolo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were killed. I'm sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You will tell us everything you've seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They'll find me, sir. They'll kill me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, they won't. Because I will kill you first. Tell me what you've seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not dead!

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for not dying!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did get bit.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think that works, is like, if it goes all the way down to zero-- [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, guys. Couple of quick things before we jump into this. One, we are 38 subs from our next giveaway. Giveaway is for those who are active in chat, get a signed photo of the cast of Critical Role, as well as a signed piece of art, wonderful piece of art from our Kit Buss who's right here with us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you guys seen them? They're awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Free shirt. We'll get this to you, so congratulations and thanks for watching tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Real talk, the winner here tonight is me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was so scared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You win another day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been one of the most emotional nights of my life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. As you all begin to gather around on the front of the courtyard of the palace, you can see some of the guards start rushing out amongst the splinters of this carriage that has been royally destroyed by many of you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do I see that everybody's safe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you get the sense that there is no immediate danger.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to use my lizard-brain and sniff out immediately Allura, and I'm going to go find her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we see him go find her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys currently are too engrossed with Percy currently pinning a young boy on the ground and shooting his hand off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently like, "Please. What do you need? Just let me go. Please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want you to spend the rest of your life making up for the things you've allowed to happen. I now take the butt of my gun and I'm going to knock him unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't quite know. I'm just rolling, but I'd normally get 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, at the point of life he has left (whack). Yeah, he just (impact) falls and crumples to the ground unconscious, pool of blood forming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there soldiers coming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are guards coming now from the palace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put him in a cell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, we can put him in our cell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, put him in our cell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll bring him to Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But make sure he doesn't bleed out first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's fine. He's not bleeding. It was non-lethal damage, right; he's not bleeding out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, not from the head but he is missing three fingers from one hand and is currently pooling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'll solder up his wounds a bit, make sure he doesn't die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Briarwoods got away. God knows where they're off to. You gather somewhere back in their territory, on their own turf. And you all look about at the guards gathering, making questions, and there are now two guards very intensely harrying this tiefling that showed up out of nowhere and began aiding the battle. You see now, one guard has an arm going to your shoulder and says, "You, what's your name? What's your business "here? You do not have approval to be here at the palace."

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I have been working here for months. You did not notice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think we would notice a tiefling in our midst. You're under arrest. Throw her in the cell."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's fine. Walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard gives you a look and says, "As far as we know right now, you both, all of you, "attacked two of our guests in the center of our own palace. They managed to flee. We're going to "investigate this. Currently we're holding no one at immediate prison sentence for this, but--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You realize your lord would not be alive now were it not for us, don't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, you're a common guard. I'm speaking because Tiberius would say this, and he's not here right now because he's a little stupid at the moment, but do not interfere with the businesses that we have already arranged with people who have higher authority than you. Back off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm not good at this shit. I'm going to train in it. It's coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get a d6 inspiration dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also still have Scanlan's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you already have Scanlan's, then that's all you need.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I walk over and stand behind her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to add my Scanlan. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The guard looks at you for a second, then steps away. "I mean no offense, "understand we've had--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's up? What's good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He relinquishes the hand on the side of the tiefling and says, "We're going to investigate "this. I mean no disrespect to you. You've been much aid to Emon. Just understand, this is a very "peculiar circumstance. Please, we'll call you when it's time to get your opinions and your "perspectives on the evening's events."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we'll call you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We need to go ahead and notify--" at this point you can see now, Tiberius, you've stepped up in front of the stairs as Allura comes rushing out to inspect everything and sees you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (groaning, fumbling) And I go to Lockheed, and I use my telepathic bond that I have with my pet. And I convey to him, to tell her, I emote to him, with my telepathic link with him, and I (foreign words).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't even form language thoughts.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what I emote to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can give him an emotion. That's the most you can get to him right now

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right, and I try to have him telepathically tell her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tell her what emotion?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She steps forward and says, "Tiberius--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The universal symbol for I'm choking.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (frustrated noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you just breathe flame out and Allura steps back for a second, "Tiberius, are you all "right? You've been cursed by something. Hold on." She takes your head and holds you in place to calm you down. "Tiberius, calm yourself." And begins to inspect you, running her fingers up the side of your snout and like, "This is not good, this is very powerful magic. I don't know if I have "capability of doing this really, you need a cleric. Please, sit tight, stay right here." The rest of you, as the guards back away, you're left alone and the rest of the group are looking upon you in a curious way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vampires!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a tiefling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to inspect the carriage to see if there's anything interesting about the carriage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you hurt? Did they do anything to you? You were unconscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They bit me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I search him and look for any mark.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't feel right. I think I need to go to a temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a health check on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a medicine check, sure. Percy, go ahead and roll an investigation check

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I'm dangerous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, there are definitely two puncture wounds on the side of his neck

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You need to put me in the dungeon very soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've read about this. We bury him under the ground for five days and five nights, all will be better.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's kimchi.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it could be. Could be kimchi. Either way, it will be very tasty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most everything that would be of interest has been destroyed in the sheer force of the explosion. The carriage is in tatters. There's not much you can really glean from it, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time of day is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Time of night. Right now, it's probably cresting close to 10:00 or 11:00PM.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would the Sarenrae temple still be open? It's a church. They're 24 hours, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, (laughs) the temple is always there, per se. I mean, there are multiple temples in the city as well. The Sarenrae temple is the one you know best.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn and look. You.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You helped us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your real name.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: You have interesting taste in enemies, almost as interesting as mine. My name is Lillith.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lillith? That's so pretty.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Thank you, as are you also, might I add.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Interesting taste in enemies. Do you know anything about vampires?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Regrettably, not as much as I would like. But your brother? He does look, not as healthy as I imagine he may usually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you a healer of some sort?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I am not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, what do you deal in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And why did you in

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Oh, really? Well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aluminium.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Laboratory.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Astronaut.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's just keep listing words, guys.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Lift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lift!

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I think you have currently more pressing matters than my concerns, my presence here in the castle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you'll come with us?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: If that is what you wish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are you from? Your accent's so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's wonderfully interesting Keyleth, but we need to get my brother to a cleric.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, as you guys are discussing, and you're already nervous that you're out in the open anyway. You're not under one of your various guises. You feel this warm bolt of heat in your upper torso area. And you guys watch as suddenly across the front of her chest, this strange, glowing, red eye-like sigil (flame noises) emblazons across the front and then slowly fades.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am just looking at the symbol, I am not looking at anything else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you all right? Are you with the Briarwoods?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: No, but I must leave. I must leave this place right now. Immediately. I drop a shroud of illusion over myself again, become the maidservant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch her visual image shimmer back into that of a servant. And even through the illusion there is still this dull, pulsating red, glowing arcane mark of an eye, that's slowly shimmering on the front of her torso.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you come with us to a temple?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: For not long. I cannot linger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that mark on you?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: This is the mark of the Broker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Broker?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I must leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You helped us in battle. Do you need us to help hide you?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I would not drag you into my troubles. I know who you are, you are Vox Machina.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you know about us?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, Zahra! She's so wonderful. I love her so much!

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: We are very close. She is a dear friend of mine, but she told me of you. I know you have your own troubles. I would not drag you into mine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well look, we've got to make a pit stop at the temple of Sarenrae, anyway. Why don't you at least join us, and then we can at least go back to Greyskull keep for dinner, because we also have to drag this prisoner back there. It's along the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Any watcher that comes after you we'll fight them. We're very strong right now and full of health.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we protect things with tails.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A voice rings out suddenly from behind you towards the palace. "All of you, stop your "business." And you look and you see there in his robes, Uriel, which you summoned, standing at the front of the palace. "Am I to understand there has been a scuffle with my guests?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your guests are vampires. Look at my brother right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Tiberius is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An idiot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's an idiot. I don't know where he's an idiot right now. Damn it, we lost Tiberius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's even more of an idiot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (calling out) Tiberius!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see now on the front steps sitting there next to Allura, who's cradling him, as he's unsure of what is happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, do we see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at his neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uriel looks and says, "I'm certain there is some sort of explanation for this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You invited vampires into your palace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You invited them in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will investigate. Look, the Briarwoods are esteemed guests of ours, and friends. So this "is going to be taken very seriously."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can have whatever mages you want cast truth on me. I was bitten. This threat is real.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Briarwoods murdered the de Rolos and took Whitestone. I have proof. I was there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tomorrow, when the sun rises, find yourself back to the palace. I would very much like to speak "with you. This disturbs me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would recommend, Uriel, dis-inviting them for now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have earned your trust, have we not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have. As have they."

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Oh, flames everywhere and ripped dresses and heaving bosoms. Oh my lord! It was awful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." Go ahead and make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a common servant girl. She wouldn't lie!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Look, she is traumatized.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, calm yourself, calm yourself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all right darling. It's all right.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Oh! It were awful!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll take care of her for now.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Oh, I'm getting the vapors! Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bring me what proof you have. This is a very, very "serious thing you're discussing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll talk to him in the morning. We got to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys gather up--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn into a horse and pick up Vax and Vex and take them to Sarenrae's temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys leap onto the back of Keyleth as she rides off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hold onto your mighty mane, and then him as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's not well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He seems totally normal to me. Seems like every day. Yep, that's pretty much basic him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Seeker Asum still around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeker Asum currently is nowhere near this situation.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I lick all of Vox Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All that are present, because many are now riding away on a horse. (laughs) But the rest of them get a fine licking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh jeez, no!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I lick Grog the most.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smells like flies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all manage to make you way up to the temple of Sarenrae. The lantern light of the interior of the temple's main structure is low, as it is late in the evening. Nevertheless, the gates are always open. And as you enter, you are greeted by two clerics that are dressed in long, flowing yellow and gold robes, and there is one elderly cleric that you recall. The one that led the resurrection ritual on Pike. Not but almost a year ago actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take you down, as well. And I say, please, please sir, I hope we're not disturbing you, but we need your help again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I totally eat it and just hit the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That wasn't my fault.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two younger clerics step away as the older one steps forward. He's balding on top, this long straggly white gray hair that crests--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (sniffing noises)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He used to be a very intelligent sorcerer. This is part of the problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do step in, too, the two clerics give you a look, and are uncomfortable with the presence. And as it has, you guys, through your travels, you have encountered very few tieflings, let alone on this continent. In fact, most you have met were in Vasselheim. This one in Emon stands out like a sore thumb and everyone seems to be just a little put off by her presence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought she was disguised.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. Never mind, I retract that entire sequence.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: He's still looking nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so glad that didn't happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Illusions. All right, so. As you guys enter the center of the chamber. He begins burning various incenses. As you step up, the cleric says, "Understand, these services are intensive in the "costs required to present them to you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll pay whatever cost you need.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we should haggle, don't you think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I lick the cleric.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) The cleric: "Oh no, that-- that's, that's very--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much will it take to save our friends?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sir, anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He says: "For this one, we require a donation to the temple of Sarenrae of a hundred "gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for the first time in at least the past half an hour or so, you are back to being Tiberius Stormwind.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (licking sounds)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's uncalled for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could there be side effects or something?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I just wanted to really do that. That was really inconvenient. Let's help Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. You're with us again.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well, welcome back. How was it, being dumb?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was quite frightened, most of the time. I didn't know what was going on. I couldn't cast spells and I was-- Let's help Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't shit yourself, so you're a winner.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's good, yes. You shit yourself, Vax? I cast Prestidigitation on his butt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the-- Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're clean; don't worry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you bring Vax forward, the cleric leans forward. "What is wrong with this one?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was bitten by something quite unholy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. The good news is, if you're standing here, then most of the danger is gone. However, "there might be some residual of the infection." He leans forward and inspects it for a second, reaches into his pouch and pulls out some herbs and presses them into it. It burns a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, do I recognize what herbs he's using?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nature check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it sticky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is glissfoil. Glissfoil is used by many medicinal practitioners as a means of burning away infections and cleansing wounds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He didn't even look down. He just said it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who didn't know that here, honestly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he presses in, he looks to you. "As long as this doesn't get infected, it should be all "right. I assume, based on what you say, the nature of these wounds, that is some sort of--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They drank his blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vampirism."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what I know of vampirism, it requires many tastes of your life force and bringing you to "the threshold of death and beyond to truly turn you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen, doc, I can't bite anybody here. Are you sure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unless this is some unnatural thing beyond classic vampirism, you should be fine."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean, unnatural?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, any vampirism is a little unnatural.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Excuse me? Do you actually have any extra of that glissfoil or any seeds that I could take with me? That way I can just keep up on his daily disinfection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly." He reaches into a pouch and pulls out a handful of glissfoil. It's like a dried yellowish green leaf that curls in itself a little bit and gives it to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As it happens, I reach for my decanter and I can control the charge; it's just charged, but I dissipate the charge. But also keep it for a little bit? No, I dissipate the whole thing. And I turn to the cleric and I go, oh holy man which cured my mind, would you be so graceful as to use the force of Sarenrae to bless the water in my canteen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To what the water?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: To bless it. I'm going to hold it up above my head way too dramatically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to leave it here, we could make use of "this and bless the contents of it, yes."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I thought you could like do a Hosannah and get me out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But should you require such blessing, we would be "happy to oblige."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful! How many days, give or take, do you think it might take to accomplish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For that amount there? Two days."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh wonderful! We'll be here for two days, guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably will.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll leave it with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For this volume--" He looks at it for a second and says, "This is an enchanted vial, is it not?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes! Good eye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm curious to see how this will interact with the enchantment. We'll try. We'll put it at a "25 gold donation for the two days of enchantment."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I give you 50.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you for your service. The other 25 is for my brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, is there anything else I can do to help you this evening?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for all your assistance. Did he tell us a price for fixing Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was a simple disinfection. There's no price for that. We're happy to heal here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our friend Pike would be much, much grateful for your service.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pike Trickfoot?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, do you remember her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's in Vasselheim, restoring another temple of Sarenrae at this moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spreading the good word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This deep smile brings his face from this deep melancholy tentativeness to this warmth you hadn't seen before, and he goes, "I had not known that our lady had reach as far as Vasselheim." (offscreen thud)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It appears you've messed yourself."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry! Is that blessed holy water? I'm sorry. I'll pay for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm happy to hear that she has continued carrying her faith to distant lands, and that she "has recovered well since our last meeting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She has.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's thriving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And one more thing before we leave. If you need any items, be they gear or blades, go to Gilmore's! Gilmore's Glorious Goods! Today!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You don't have to sell it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're supposed to plug him, right? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was a little ham-fisted, but he does speak the truth. Gilmore makes a quality item.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was very awkward, Scanlan, but it's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes "Gilmore? I think I've seen that shop around."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're opening a shop in here-- just kidding. There's a shop here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is a shop here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me and the clerics might have to go see it, then."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell them Vox Machina sent you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you get ten percent off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you say Vax'ildan sent you, you might get 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nevertheless, sleep calls to me. I must get back to--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sleep calls to us as well, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, good night and adieu to you all."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for opening your doors.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, oh, what was your name? For the next time we have a dead ally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) Oh, tomorrow, you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tristan."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cleric Tristan? Thank you, Cleric Tristan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blessed be Sarenrae's name.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I awkwardly bow out and say: See you in two days, oh mighty brain fixer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He steps back. The lights dim on the inside of the temple as you exit. You guys step out into the cold night air on the streets of Emon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (yelling) I'm alive!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's loud. That hurt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, headphones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am sorry to everyone watching at home for blowing out the mic, but gods damn it, I'm alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, actually, while we walk back to Greyskull, what happened?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, we're good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I saved your life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius, you are smart and I am very stupid. You are extremely handsome and I am ugly.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't disagree with any of that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would have been true 30 minutes ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm sorry. And Percy, I'm especially sorry. To you most of all. We weren't ready, you weren't ready.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll hunt them down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They said your family was still there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're liars. My family is dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll track them down, we'll find them, we'll kill them, and seek revenge.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And then we'll loot their bodies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think we'll have to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't think we'll have to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they're going to find us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They won't attack us! We're many, and they're few.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That we know of.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just because we're in a keep does not mean we are safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to set alarms around our keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We also need to protect our new friend, Lillith fair, over here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that your last name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, she's white, so I thought maybe--

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: My family name is Daturai.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you spell that?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: (chuckles) In your tongue? D-A-T-U-R-A-I.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lost track after the D.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: You have had a rough evening, it's understandable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope you've learned your lesson.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It'll be two weeks, at least, before I do anything--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quite so stupid and reckless--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had a code word.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We had Jumanji!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jenga.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Damn it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look back at this point and you see, as you guys are reaching the outer wall of Emon, (galloping noise) behind you. (happy bear noises) Rubs up against you. (moans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your uncle almost died! I almost died. Did you know I almost died, darling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Licks the side of your face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lean in, and I lick his nose with my own tongue. And then I let him lick me all over the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sloppy bear noises)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you for your risk. Yes, you were foolish, but thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk up to Vax and I extend my hand, and I say, I'm glad you didn't die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love you, Grog. Would you like to draw balls on my forehead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't move at all. I just take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d4, divided by two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The echo from the impact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I say, no one kills you but me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You deserved that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Let's all get some rest, shall we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but we'll have to prepare ourselves for an attack or perhaps stalk them and kill them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we're going to find out in a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And don't we have a prisoner?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we have a guest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and we still haven't found what the Broker-- who he is, or what he is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need to run from the Broker, or can you stay with us for a few days?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do you owe some money? I don't understand.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: How well guarded against scrying is your keep?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about your room, Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're guarded against scrying in your room?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Guards against scrying? Yes, of course!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Against scrying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure we would have to have an enchantment on our keep that would guard against scrying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not going to help you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that little shitty Mr. Missing One Hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Standing straight, with a grin. Deep dark red skin, burning yellow eyes and jet black, slicked hair between two horns that jut back. A tiefling stands there, looking forward, with two individuals flanking from side to side that are slowly stepping--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't know what they do, but I'm raising my arm up. Who goes there? Who are you? I've had a really bad day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tiefling, the male tiefling, steps up forward and says, "I've no quarrel with any of "you. We've been scouring this city for a fugitive for a number of weeks. And as luck would have it, "you guys happened to smoke her out of her hole."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go ahead and crack my staff on the ground and cast Anti-life Shell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And are they at the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are walking from the outside of the wall to your keep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now? They are coming from Emon. You guys are in this in-between section between your keep--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're outdoors? We've left the temple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yes. And we're going to go ahead and have you guys roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get close to me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth started this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get close-- what? Did I? But that's a spell I cast on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Casting spells, generally, for most people is a bad idea.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so from a visual perspective here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yo, Stoneskin's up, dude. I didn't get to say that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stoneskin's up on you, Anti-life Shell. Who is where?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tibs and I are in the front, right? Because we both took aggressive postures.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The closer to me you are, the more you'll be guarded by the shell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who said I want to be guarded?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can still fight around it. They just can't get in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Trinket is over this side here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we have a prisoner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The prisoner was brought to your keep by the guards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tiberius and I took the aggressive stance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you guys would be up that way. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, why is there more than one person?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said two people are flanking him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the initiative order here? So who got 25 to 20? All righty. 20?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, nice. Grog, what did you get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My magic, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you say, Keyleth, you got 11?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 11. Bringing up the rears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Is that everybody? Cool. We're good. So. As you (crash), how big is the radius of the Anti-life Shell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone within ten feet of me. A decent amount right now. Not Tiberius, not Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not technically Grog, because Grog would be up front right there. So a ten-foot radius around you. And what does it do, Anti-life Shell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing aside from undead and constructs can get into it. You can still cast spells, and fire bows, and you can still do stuff. We can go out, they just can't get in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled a very high initiative. High dex character.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is the Broker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. "Sweet Lillith, you've been a very bad girl. Nefertiri, Nethspira, and Bellenore would "all like to have a word with you. They've paid quite a bit of sum, and proven legally: you need "to be taken back. Now, to your friends here, it's your choice: the easy way, or the hard way."

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I use Minor Illusion, one of my cantrips, and I puff up like a cloud of nightmare, and I glow, and my eyes come alight. My tail whips, my fangs get longer. Oh, I bet you did. I bet they paid you so much. You tell my sister, I hope her face still festers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Choice is made." And with that, (whoosh) he vanishes from sight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends his turn.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait, is he casting that? Did he cast Vanish?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was a casting, yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sweet. Counterspell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll a d20.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 4th-level, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you mean 6th-level?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a spell.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (humming) What is this? What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, it just fails. You don't have to roll for this one, this is Invisibility. So as he goes to vanish, you "Oh!" as a reaction, pull out your Counterspell, and his image shimmers, and then returns. "Oh, that's not even fair."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I haven't gotten to do much today. And you won't, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very good. Well, he's then going to use his move action to shift over this way to there. All right, that ends him. Lillith, you're up.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Okay. I would like to...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Buy a vowel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Kit Buss! Come on, fuck him up! Kit Buss!

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Can I use Phantasmal Killer again, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to, yeah. All right, against which one?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Against the Broker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so he's going to go ahead and make his wisdom saving throw. What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll 4d10 psychic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 4d10? Holy shit! Do you need extra ones? Here's a gold one for you.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Thank you! Oh wow, I have so many pretty dice right now! It's lovely. Ooh, yeah! Ooh, so 29.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little bit of Kit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to stay where you are, or do you want to move?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I'll stay where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. Vex, you're up. Tiberius, you're up at the same time. We'll go with Vex first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to tell Trinket to

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He suffers 14 points of bludgeoning damage as Trinket tears through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat it! Go, Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is knocked prone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, buddy! Little buddy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Trinket's attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I get a move, still. I mean, I get an action. I'm going attack him! I'm going to attack the Broker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For how that works for you and your bear, because that's his attack this turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, yes. I'm assuming that's his attack, or was that his move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that's his attack. It's been a while since you attacked with Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get to have Trinket attack, and then I get to attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once, right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, attack action plus Trinket attack. It says one attack for me and two attacks for Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trinket gets two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make one attack yourself while commanding it, so you get one weapon attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you should erase that and write seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Trinket goes by, since it didn't hit him, he gets an attack of opportunity on Trinket. Does hit. Trinket does take seven points of slashing damage from the Broker as he misses him and he hits as he goes by.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's got armor on. All right, fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 21 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 against the Broker? All right, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14. I'm going to assume-- I mean, it's probably way too far, but I want to keep my Hunter's Mark on Lord Briarwood for the time being. So I'm not going to break that, even though he's probably far away, so it's just 14 damage to the Broker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Vex's turn. Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. Can I see the Broker where I am at now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog's in the way. You can barely see.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to spend three sorcery points and heighten my spell, which gives disadvantage on both those two rolls. I'm going to cast a 5th-level Fireball right on the cusp where it hits those two buttholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't hit Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there it would hit both of them and not hit Trinket.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: There it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so they both have disadvantage on their saving throws?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what heighten spell does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. As you arc around the side, you release the one single beam of flashing red energy, sparks at the end of the finger, lobs forward. (explosion) With a gargantuan explosion, red flames swirl into the area, sending the whole area, the dark part of the night, open field alight. You see all the green, dried grass is immediately burnt to a black crisp. Go ahead and roll damage. What's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they both fail with disadvantage. Full damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the dice!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: All of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) Oh my god!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And then I'm going to spend one sorcery point to empower the spell. And then I'm going to use the six and I'm going to choose one, two, three, and four, and five, and six to re-roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Think of how handy that would've been against the Briarwoods.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Four, five, six. Okay, I'm going to roll these.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Much better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only use one metamagic option on a spell when you cast it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Empower spell is the only one that doubles with any other metamagic. I can do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh interesting. Good to know. Thank you for the heads up. That's cool. I like that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (spellcasting sound effect)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the explosion bursts forth, the flames dissipate. You can see the Broker there looking angry, frightened. Immediately takes some of the flame...

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Before he does that, I go (laughing), I look over at Keyleth, and I use bonus action to cast Misty Step and I go right next to her and I vanish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You vanish behind her, and as he pulls back the flames and then releases them they snake between everyone and go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I make it. But it's fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is fire damage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Good, instead of missing it I'm going to (swoosh, gulps) swallow it. (grunts) That's 20. My dex save was 20. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, okay, good thank you for the heads up on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You swallowed it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take half damage. The angry tiefling hits you with a Hellish Rebuke.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Blowing smoke through my nose (snorts).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be seven damage. You take half damage from fire, so that would be four fire damage as you take the Hellish Rebuke's burst of flaming, dark, arcane energy and (gulps) swallow it and take it in. You blow it out the side of your nostrils. And it burns, but damn does it look cool.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? Shit. Is that the old lady over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here on this side, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll take a step towards her and I will try-- it's never worked for me, it probably won't work. I'll try Eyebite on her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the time. Right here, right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I roll? I'm doing it through my Horn of Clarity or whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it's a wisdom saving throw on her end. What's the DC on that? Is it 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So no, that does not make it. So what're you choosing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I choose Sleep. (singing) Rock-a-bye, old lady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So she turns around, she's holding this gnarled wand in her hand, as she comes around she gives you this strange look and goes "What?" And falls unconscious on the ground asleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I didn't watch Matlock--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I'll just inspire our new tiefling friend with a little sexy dance.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Is he always like this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, he is. Don't you feel so inspired?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Oh, you have no idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a d10 inspiration dice. It makes you laugh. It's less of an attraction thing and more of a, "Oh, gnomes. They're so small."

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Oh, how special.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, everybody's doing new stuff. With 50-foot speed, can I get to the far side of the old lady that's sleeping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I get like behind her so I can-- I need the laser pointer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to get right there, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Yeah, on the opposite side of her from where I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's asleep. What are you going to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kill that motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I'd like to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She will wake up. Unless you cleave her in half, she will wake up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Grog. He doesn't give a shit about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out the Javelin of Lightning. I whisper the command word, which is Penelope, and I throw it in a straight line, which will hit all three of them, in a five-foot-wide line that extends 120 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so smart, Grog!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You just did math!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at you! When it comes to battle, he knows things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's five foot wide, so it'll hit him and one of these, or her and one of these two guys. It hits something in a five-foot line.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The guy that's standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the Broker. Get the Broker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you pull it out and as you throw it downward. The javelin goes from a metallic blade into a bolt of arcing electric energy that slams downward. Penelope does not-- not Penelope. You keep shouting it at me. The old woman on the ground gets no saving throw because she's unconscious and she takes double damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Double damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 4d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Killed that old woman so good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And if he makes a saving throw of a DC 13, it's halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The javelin arcs through and goes towards there, and then he does make his dexterity saving throw against that. He's a pretty dexterous guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It takes a little shock, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so it takes a little bit of damage which was, what was it you rolled, was it a 14? So it takes seven points of lightning damage for that, and then make a ranged attack on the actual javelin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does that do? I don't even have that on here. I have no idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry. That was against the target, so since he was the target, he takes the impact. The lightning bolt arcs through the old woman. She (screams) shakes awake, screaming as the bolt arcs upward from the ground, and right before it goes toward the Broker, as he rears back in fear, it solidifies into the javelin as it once again slams into the front of his torso. He's like, (grunting, gasping). He pulls it out. Shakes it for a second, looking at it, confused.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look at Tiberius and I go, I did magic!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It was very impressive. Good job, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you! Penelope.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's my mother's name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, he got up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy gets up and only has a half move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he get that close?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On half movement, yeah. Runs up to you. As he does so you can see, holding on his side, gets up and goes bolting towards you, arcing around the side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My arcane--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anti-life Shell. The Anti-life Shell does--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blocks living things. They can't come in.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Unless you invite them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like vampires.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a ten-foot radius you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax'ildan flips him the double birds as he hits the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From inside the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's unable to, just runs forward, hits the barrier, skids past, hold his place there instead then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's unfortunate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, has a spear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still rushes around with it, both hands on it, arcing towards you with it. That is going to be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use Uncanny Dodge with it? Or is it too late?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going very poorly for them. All right, Vax, it's your turn now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. The first one is, not that great, but it's all right. It's an 18. These guys are dickheads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 18 against the Broker just barely hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. That's ten points of damage. The second dagger hits him, I hope. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that does hit, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one hits. That is three, six, nine. Plus, he has to make a saving throw against a DC 15 for poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution. He is going to fail that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, go fuck yourself. That's not the right die is what that is. Let's see, poison damage is-- that's not great. Ten. Ten points of poison. You are awesome! (whooshing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what if Lillith is the bad guy instead of the good guy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kit Buss is not a bad guy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're staying where you are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where I am. I'll stay where I am

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to walk to the very edge of the spell right here, so I'm standing one closer to our friend there. Not just to you. I want to be close to the big strong schmuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the Broker holding anything? Is he, is he using a weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Broker you see has like a shortsword out. He's currently tossing it and catching it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a shortsword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or he's tossing it and catching it but like (grunts). He's having a bad day. The Broker was not prepared for Vox Machina.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20! (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn, son!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pepperbox.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is wrong with you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival de something something something de Rolo the III, you badass motherfucker!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 16 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's to the Broker?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To the Broker. I'm just shooting at the Broker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points? That is doubling the dice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is doubling both of the dice. Now a sharpshooter shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Broker can't do anything. It already used its reaction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sharpshooter shot misses. And another shot, seven, 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, cool. That's eight points of damage. Blowing an action surge and firing three more times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three more? That seems terribly unfair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sharpshooter shot. That's a 22. That's 21 points of damage. Another sharpshooter shot with ice fire. Finally, I get the breakdown on that one. The gun jammed. I put it away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that was awesome. That was pretty dope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many fired shots did I get? Was that five shots or six shots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That, that was five shots. Well, all in all, it was six shots, but five hits.
