lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so I'm out of-- all right. I don't have any more actions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's okay (chuckles). First and foremost, How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you see the nostril? His little nostril twitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do something weird here and I'm going to hold you onto this. I'm going to get a little weird, and I'm taking straight chest shots and I'm just firing chest shots, and I'm just making a hole the size of a baseball in his chest. And as it happens, as I keep unloading, the gun still breaks and I'm still pulling the trigger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (booming, gasping, coughing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (yelling) You fool, your soul is forfeit! Die! Die! I'm going to look at the other two and start pulling out my bigger gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check with advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And putting on the fucking mask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a d6 inspiration dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Picked a bad day to do your job, son!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A d6 inspiration die?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And advantage. With advantage and a d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, this is embarrassing. 17, wait with intimidation, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mask, gun, fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Standing there, smoking, giant hole, Tombstone style, in the center of his chest. There would be no dripping, except for the cauterization of the heat round that exploded in his chest and is a blackened, cinderous tube where once there was a chest cavity. The Broker (death rattle, thud) falls onto his back with a smoldering spiral of black smoke pouring forth from the chest wound on the ground. As you stare at the other two, screaming that out, you can see the old woman who's still on the ground. (panicked gasps) Looks extremely out of place and freaked out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, Doris. You'd better just lie down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The masked individual, from what you can tell behind the eyes of the mask, does not seem emotionally affected by this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, just checking, does my glove still have a charge, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It may.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I mean, is there any indication, like it would have a slight glow to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a slight vibration. That ends your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The old woman gets up and is like, (panicked gasps).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (old lady voice) I feel happy. I feel alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're in Atlantic City. Everything's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action, casts Misty Step and appearing 30 feet over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get to swing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Because Misty Step happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn Misty and her steps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She stands up and vanishes in a swirl of vapor. She appears a little ways away in the field and immediately, (mumbles a spell).

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Counterspell! 5th-level. Fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would be able to, because it has been your turn, you would have your reaction back. So yes, you could. So go ahead and roll a d20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt's like, damn you and your Counterspells. You're ruining my plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the best running I've ever seen! The little gait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tries to run away, the slippery wet grass, she slips a little bit as she's trying to get away now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel bad for her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends her turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Upon seeing Percy go absolutely insane and screaming "your soul is now forfeit," out of shock, my Anti-Life Shell dissipates, and I spend my action staring at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow. Going for the roleplay, not the damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Broker's not getting a turn. Lillith, you're up.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Okay. I would like to use Animate Dead on the Broker, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gasps) You nasty woman, you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's so happy about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can begin using it, because it's a one-minute casting time. You have to get closer because you're probably a ways away.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Right. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got a naughty streak.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: It's my family. I cannot help it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, from there you begin concentrating on Animate Dead as you begin pulling through and speaking in guttural tones that have multiple layers of tonality and volume. It's this weird symphony of discordant voices as she begins to speak. You can see now the smoking, ruined body of the Broker begins to shift and twitch on its own. So that'll conclude your turn, Lillith. Vex and Tiberius, you guys are up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got asshole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to attack him with a bow. I'm going to attack him with my Entangle arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The big guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. The guy in the mask. He's the only one left right? Oh, the old lady's still running away? All right, I'll attack the guy in the mask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That old lady has to die!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that definitely hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, 15. Plus Entangle, whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Good to know. And so as you pull back the arrow and release it, there is that-- the way that you constructed it, there's just this pouch of very thick gooey-- is this the spell or is it the actual arrow constructed by Percy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, the one that he built? So what happens is that the front of the arrow, it doesn't do any actual damage on the impact. Instead what it does is it, when it smacks into it, there's a pouch in the front that detonates from the impact and sends this very quick-setting tar, like glue substance. That just spatters across the body and lower torso, it expands like a foam. There's no damage on that one, but it's currently (grunts) grappled by it and cannot move from its place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. And so I'll shoot another arrow at the other lady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know she's running away, but she's a bad guy. I didn't hit her, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heh. It's funny-- mages don't have a lot of armor. Even with mage armor, you manage to hit her square in the back. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably four inches into the back of her shoulder blade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is becoming a Monty Python sketch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (old lady voice) I feel fine. I feel happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket growls (growls menacingly). She goes, (terrified shriek) and yelps out as the giant bear--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will you start running for us again, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When we get to her turn. I'm saving it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to command Trinket to run after her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's Trinket's movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is like an afternoon at the gym for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have any idea. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, I have it here. Trinket's movement is 40 feet. Okay, that's as far as Trinket can get right there. I have a little Trinket cheat sheet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the tiniest cheat sheet ever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Littlest character sheet ever. Can you hold that up again? Look how tiny it is! Aw, that big bear and that tiny piece of paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, the guy in the mask is prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His lower body is currently held in this weird tar-like substance. He's like, (grunts) trying to break free.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I only get one 6th-level spell but it says on Eyebite that every subsequent action, I can do it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just choose somebody else to do it to, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to do it to her again. To the old lady again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But can't target a creature again-- oh, if it succeeded on a saving throw. You're right, so she can. So what do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's Tiberius's turn. He and I have the same initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right, sorry about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, are you going to hold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he waits for you to finish. But he can hold his turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just run up, as far as I need to be within 60 feet and do it again to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she's within range. And what're you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just fall asleep again. Back to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 17. Nope. (panicked breathing) Falls asleep on the ground. With the arrow (arrow twang) right out of the back. And you acquiesce to Tiberius. It's your go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, and I'll inspire him. With a musical fart. (fart noise)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That was a wonderful toot, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, d10 inspiration die. Tiberius, it's your go.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Cool. I'm going to go as far as I can towards the old broad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're focusing so much on this poor old woman and there's big intimidating--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Poor old woman? She's an evil mercenary. She deserves to be taken out!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He hasn't taken any damage, has he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's taken quite a bit of damage

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't be ageist! That is an evil bitch! She needs to be killed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ageist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Tiberius, what're you doing? She's currently asleep on the ground. This guy's like, (grunts).

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Am I within 60 feet of the old lady? That's pretty far still. Don't know whether I am or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, she's just out of the range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've fallen, and I can't get up!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. I am within 120 right? So what I'm going to do instead, is I'm going to look down and I'm going to pull out my Krull Blade and I'm going to throw it in the air and cast Telekinesis on it (spinning).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you do it catches itself, spinning in the air up ahead of you, (spinning) this strange vibrating high-pitched whine sound as the blades are spinning in rapid circular motion.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm going to go, (swishing) and I'm going to huck it at the chick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll a spell attack roll.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or 5d4 times two plus five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 5d4 times two plus five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. So just roll 5d4 and then multiply everything by two.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Six, seven, eight, nine, ten, 11, 12, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 26 plus five is 31 points of damage. The unconscious woman face down on the ground, the blade tears through and grinds a large wedge out of her back. Spraying a bit of gore across the nearby grass. Thankfully, she was asleep, so she probably didn't feel it, it was so fast. But she is definitively gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are being sadistic today.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'll bring it back to me. I'll keep it hovering, maintain the spell. I'm going to bonus action Misty Step towards where Grog is. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the sake of brevity at this point, because you have a glued guy, and the entire team pretty much at full health here, over time you all slowly gather around the guy who's glued to the ground. And he's fighting at first, (grunts) and you see he lowers his head, giving into his fate.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Smart to not test your fate, boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lillith, can I go play t-ball with his head?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Let him live. Let this one live.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, we're letting people live now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kill me, give me honor. I have fallen."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry I retract that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Krull Blade in the neck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh you just elbowed me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you just hit Keyleth's funny bone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, right in the funny bone.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's kind of funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, will you kill this guy?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: If honor is what he wants, do not give it to him. Let him live.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I like it. I walk up and I take his mask off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you pull the mask off--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know what to do-- Scanlan. This is your moment. Shit on his face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's disgusting!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, that's not just something I can do whenever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who are you kidding?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to be in the mood, I need music, some nice lighting, I need to be wined and dined a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My sister's right. Do it on his chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you pop the mask off, and from immediately beneath it reaches up and covers the face--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the Broker?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the masked guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's severe damage to the face. He looks at you and goes "Kill me. It's all I have."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, darling. You live.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (angry growl) And it's flexing and reaching out at you but it can't quite get the range. It's going to attempt to try to-- no it just cannot break free of that (strained grunts). As you're still concentrating on the spell, slowly the Broker steps up, the eyes rolled back and white, the giant wound in the chest, hobbles towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was almost my turn. Can I throw daggers at him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she just reanimated him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You reanimated him? Oh then, never mind. I'm sorry, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull your blade out, she commands and gives a hand motion, and the Broker hobbles towards her.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: My sisters, they sent you? They are still hunting me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look down. The mark that was there on your chest has vanished. Upon the point of the Broker's death, whatever enchantment was placed upon you that was keeping you under his gaze was abolished.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Return to Palac Lusterka and present yourself to my sisters. Let them see what good it will do them to hunt me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around and starts shambling off.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, wait a minute, hold on. And I as he's walking away, I'm going to loot that dude. Take shit off him. Come on. Hold on, let me take this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a mostly ruined set of studded leather armor that is enchanted, plus one. It's basic, but it's need of serious repair as it currently has a large gaping hole in the chest area. And a shortsword. Plus-one Vicious Shortsword. As Tiberius is pulling everything off of the corpse as it's trying to shamble away into the distance. Eventually, this half-naked ruined body of this tiefling begins stepping off into the night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the old lady? Do we get any loot off her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) The old lady has mostly a basic wand. It's a plus-one wand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's a wand. I toss it back to them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan? Tibs? Who wants a wand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take it. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus-one Wand of the War Mage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus-one Wand of the War Mage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A simple Ring of Protection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a ring. I take it, put it on. For the time being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And about roughly 320 gold. Amongst the two of them. At this point in time, the other guy's exhausted himself now, just still in place. You see the Broker vanish into the shadows, heading southward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shall we throw him in the pen with the other guy?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on a second, why would we keep this one around to tell us now? What'd be the point? I will kill this man unless you give me a good reason not to.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I look at him and I ask, this? My sisters, they are responsible for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a look for a second. "I've been this my whole life. They gave me purpose. I follow "them, and you've hurt the Mistresses."

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: That is true. I did do something similar to Bellenore's face. But they will not give you purpose. You are better out of their shadow. Trust me, I know. You should find better purpose for yourself. Go. Be free. I doubt that they will trouble you any more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus? Plus zero.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You still have my inspiration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Inspiration! Plus ten!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Scanlan make you feel good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. The tension in the muscles eventually relaxes, and the head hangs. "I know not for what "reason I live."

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: You seem a capable fighter, yes? My cousin recently became member of the Slayer's Take in Vasselheim. Perhaps you would care to go find purpose in testing your skills there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And if not there you can always fight in the Crucible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts)

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: They look for nothing but strength and honor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) Breaks the other leg free and stands there now before you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your purpose in life is only what you make of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do anything. You could be President of the United States.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: While this is going on, I'm writing on a piece of scroll right now. Which I give to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will walk, and I will think. Perhaps I will drown." And he turns and starts walking towards the shoreline on the other side to the west--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lillith, does this mean you are free from those who are hunting you?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: However, I have no intention of returning to my home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what was the name of your homeland again? It sounded very exotic.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Palac Lusterka is the seat of my family. We go back very long way. But I would not recommend that you visit there. It's not the most cheerful place.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not tourist-friendly?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Not particularly welcome, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've heard some terrible things about-- what is it, your father, is it? Or is it your uncle? Your uncle.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: My family in general have interesting attitudes towards affection, shall we say. My sisters-- well, you see, I'm not particularly cut out for making a good first impression. However, my sisters did always tell me that what was inside was most important. They did tell me this as they were removing intestines to divine with them, so perhaps maybe not usual meaning of this phrase, but Zahra is perhaps the member of my family that I like best.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understandably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all have those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All we care about is deeds. You've proven yourself to great depth today.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: I believe in this circumstance I pale to my present company. I've heard many wonderful things about you from Zahra, and I'm honored to not only have met you, but also to have had your aid in this matter. I'm profoundly grateful. If there is ever any opportunity at which I can return the favor, I am not useful for much, but perhaps a little smoke and mirrors I can do.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I would actually like to know how you keep your horns so shiny and clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cold wind picks up as the night air begins to darken, a distant storm blowing over the horizon to the northeast. The time draws late and cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lillith, would you like to stay the night before you move on?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: If I would not put you at any--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not even a little.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please, have dinner with us.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Then it would be my pleasure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we head back to the keep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go in the back into the garden, and I take the glissfoil out of my pocket that I was given, and I revive it from its dried state that it was given to me in, and plant it in the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And as the twins are walking I say, clearly, I'm eating shit here today. I guess I'm going to make a promise not to stray from your side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Remember that promise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I promise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what that feels like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will be our freeze-frame credit high-five for the evening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job, Kit! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, Kit, for guesting with us this evening, and for coming out and visiting us.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Thank you so much for having me. We've had an absolutely amazing week and-- oh, it's really nice to speak in my own accent again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your accent good. We enjoy.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: It really has been an honor and you will definitely be seeing me again in LA, because this was wonderful. Thank you so much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And everybody check her out on twitter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your twitter?

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: My twitter is AnemoneTea dot-- not even dot com, just AnemoneTea. It's that simple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis and Laura have to run to catch a plane flight. You guys go, rock it out, safe flight. You guys are off to...?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we got to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go. Travel safe. Bye, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I hold your mug? I want to see what it feels like. Wow! Look at the size of that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's still got some booze in there, if you want to take a slurp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As a note, just so you guys are aware, we had a contest yesterday about 5:30 in the afternoon during one of the streams. We had everyone who was currently present in the chat room be part of this random drawing, and the winner was a David Kingsbury, who won the opportunity to provide the name and essence of an NPC in our campaign. The Broker is actually their construction.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Broker was designed by one of our viewers, one of our Critters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for the target practice.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: Thank you so much!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is so cool.

lines.name: KIT
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're hoping to do stuff like that every now and then in the future to bring in some Critters to throw their creative mind in here and incorporate a character into our world. My heart's been going a mile a minute that entire game, because no DM wants to have to kill a player.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was on the verge of bawling my eyes out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I ever died, I thought-- and I still think I'll probably be the first-- but if I ever died, I thought it would be more like a bus accident. I would just go (impact) and that'd be it. I didn't think the doctor would look at me and say, I'm sorry, you have one week to live. And the whole week I've been sweating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty harsh. The internet was very vocal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, thanks guys, for putting the pressure on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [end of transcript]
